ref.div: M. Prather, G. Flato, P. Friedlingstein, C. Jones, J.-F. Lamarque, H. Liao, P. Rasch, IPCC 2013: Annex II: Climate system scenario tables, in Climate Change 2013: The Physical Science Basis.
